PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-07132009-05-14,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActTransportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
PrecisReappointment of FAYE HELEN SMITH of Gloucester, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, and designation of FAYE HELEN SMITH as Chairperson of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three months, or for a term ending when a new Chairperson of the Tribunal is designated, effective May 30, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
